claim: Sunrise devised an anime spearheaded by Yoshiyuki Tomino.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A direct follow up to Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam , it is directed and written by Yoshiyuki Tomino , and he assembled a new team consisting of character designer Hiroyuki Kitazume , who had been one of Zeta Gundam 's animation directors , and mechanical designers Makoto Kobayashi , Yutaka Izubuchi and Mika Akitaka .

claim: Sunrise devised an anime spearheaded by Yoshiyuki Tomino.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Created and directed by Yoshiyuki Tomino , it premiered in Japan on Nagoya Broadcasting Network and its affiliated ANN stations on April 7 , 1979 , and lasted until January 26 , 1980 , spanning 43 episodes .
